name: Dangerous Space Collection
description:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
- - - - - Controls - - - - -
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
W, A, S, D - Movement
Left Click - Fire
Right Click - Fire Burst
Escape - Return to Main Menu

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
- - - - - - About - - - - - -
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
This game was created as a submission for the Weekly Game Jam #125 "Dangerous Collection"

Originally the game was suppossed to be a nanobot moving throughout a human body killing clusters or "collections" of cancerous cells. 
After getting my code to a playable point I realized that I wouldn't have enough time to do the art for my original idea, so I opted for a simple space background and simple shapes for enemies. 

I have been under some very strict time constraints with this one due to work, family, and other things in my day to day.
There are many things I wish I could have done before submitting this but I am still happy with my results. 

I do plan on returning to this project to bring my original idea to life. But in the meantime, please try out my little game and let me know what you think.  

Made with Unity
Sound effects were created with SFXR - http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
Music created with Ecrett - https://ecrettmusic.com
